pr_title: Updated the bundled XStream library from 1.4.13 to 1.4.14

timeline.message: Also allow XStream to be bumped via Dependabot

timeline.author: jglick
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -4,3 +4,9 @@ updates:
     directory: "/"
     schedule:
       interval: "daily"
+  - package-ecosystem: "maven"
+    directory: "/"
+    schedule:
+      interval: "daily"
+    allow:
+      - dependency-name: "com.thoughtworks.xstream:xstream"
